short_description: 【Vehicle Fitment】 - Position: Front; Compatible with 2009-2013 Su-baru Forester [S12 Body Code]

【Suspension Kit Include】 2 x Front Lower Control Arm - ( 524-783 + 524-784 ) Driver & Passenger Side, 2 x Front Lower Ball Joints - K9513, 2 x Front Outer Tie Rod End Links - ES3712, 2 x Front Inner Tie Rod End Links - EV800513, 2 x Front Stabilizer Sway Bar End Links - K750049 , 2 x Rack and Pinion Boots

【About Control Arm】 - Control arms allow wheels to move up and down while preventing forward and rearward movement. They are typically equipped with bushings on the frame side of the vehicle and a ball joint on the wheel side of the vehicle that allow flex and controlled movement according to road conditions and steering input from the driver.

【Please Note】 - Before placing the order, Please refer to the Vehicle menu (amazonconfirmedfit) at the top left corner, select your vehicle's "Year, Make, Model" and click "Check Fit"to make sure the parts fit your car, or check the product page description to make sure it matches exactly.Any questions please free to contact us and you will get a satisfactory solution.
